casebody.data:
STATE OF OREGON, Respondent, v. JOHNNIE LEE LEWIS, Appellant. (No. C 72-09-2983 Cr) 510 P2d 359 Robert C. Cannon, Deputy Public Defender, Salem, argued the cause for appellant. With him on the brief was Gary D. Babcock, Public Defender, Salem. John H. Clough, Assistant Attorney General, Salem, argued the cause for respondent. With Mm on the brief were Lee Johnson, Attorney General, and John W. Osburn, Solicitor General, Salem.

Argued May 24,

affirmed May 24,

petition for rehearing denied June 14,

petition for review denied July 31, 1973

Before Schwab, Chief Judge, and Fort and Thornton, Judges.
